FuelPHP, um Framework PHP 5.3 - Documentação

 

índice

Third Party Vendor packages

Introduction

The FuelPHP core comes with several vendor packages pre-installed. Vendor packages are libraries from external parties that are integrated into the FuelPHP core.

Pre-installed packages

  • htmLawed, version 1.1.12
  • markdown_extra, version 1.0.1 (markdown) and 1.2.5 (markdown_extra)
  • PHPQuickProfiler
  • PHPSecLib, version 0.2.2
  • spyc, version 0.5
